org.momo.dict
Class Dictionary

java.lang.Object
  org.momo.dict.Dictionary

public class Dictionary
extends java.lang.Object

only entrypoint to the dictionary. create yourself an instance, load a datafile and read data. should be fast.

Author:
moritzhaarmann
